text: Kevin Patrick Brady (born April 11, 1955) is an American politician. He was the U.S. Representative for , from 1997 to 2023.Brady, Kevin Patrick. Biographical Directory of the United States Congress: 1774-present. Retrieved on October 1, 2017. He is a member of the Republican Party. In April 2021, Brady announced that he would not run for re-election in 2022. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congressman Kevin Brady official U.S. House site * Kevin Brady for Congress * * Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Texas Category:Politicians from South Dakota Category:Members of the Texas Legislature Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Kevin Brady
